sources.title: Ameresco warns of China battery delays for ESS projects
sources.snippet: April 14, 2022: Ameresco, the renewable energy developer and operator, has warned of potential delays in completing energy storage system projects in the US as a result of battery supply delays from China. The company said its battery supplier had notified it of delays caused by fresh Covid-19 lockdowns in force in several regions in China.
